Metadata.title: BAGIWEBSITE | IT Services & Solutions
Metadata.desc: Website, application and other digital solution creation services.

HomePage.title: Turn Your Ideas Into Something Amazing
HomePage.desc: At BAGIWEBSITE, we deliver digital solutions designed to inspire and make a real impact. Whether you’re starting from scratch or looking to transform a legacy platform, we help you create immersive online experiences, increase engagement, and drive your business growth to the next level.
HomePage.desc_why_us: We offer professional, customized, and state-of-the-art digital solutions to meet your business needs. With comprehensive services and responsive support, we are committed to helping you achieve success.

professionalExperience.title: Professional Experience
professionalExperience.description: We have a team of experts experienced in various fields of digital technology, ready to help you achieve your business goals.

comprehensiveServices.title: Comprehensive Services
comprehensiveServices.description: From website creation, app development, to digital marketing solutions, we offer integrated end-to-end services.

customization.title: Customization Tailored to Your Needs
customization.description: Every project is uniquely designed to suit your business needs and vision, ensuring results that meet expectations.

responsiveSupport.title: Responsive Support
responsiveSupport.description: Our team is always ready to assist you with quick support and precise solutions for every issue.

competitivePricing.title: Competitive Pricing
competitivePricing.description: We offer high-quality services at competitive prices, ensuring the best value for your investment.

satisfactionGuarantee.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
satisfactionGuarantee.description: Client satisfaction is our top priority. We work hard to ensure that you are happy with the final results we deliver.

reviews_header.title: What Do They Say About Us?
reviews_header.description: We are always committed to providing the best service to every client. Discover how their experiences working with BAGIWEBSITE have been through honest reviews and inspiring testimonials. Your satisfaction is our priority!

andi.comment: BAGIWEBSITE's service is very professional! My website was completed on time with satisfying results.

siti.comment: The design is cool and meets the requirements. However, there were some revisions at the beginning of the process.

budi.comment: Very helpful! The BAGIWEBSITE team is responsive and provides the best solutions for my business needs.

lina.comment: Great results, but the project timeline was slightly delayed. Overall, I'm satisfied.

dian.comment: Affordable prices with excellent quality. I will definitely recommend BAGIWEBSITE!

fahmi.comment: The service is decent, but communication could be faster to avoid misunderstandings.

rina.comment: The team is very skilled! My project was completed earlier than expected with perfect results.

arman.comment: The process went smoothly. There were a few minor revisions, but the final result met expectations.

nina.comment: Very satisfied with the service provided. The team is friendly and professional!

fajar.comment: My website turned out great and met my expectations. There were some technical issues, but they were quickly resolved.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become a trusted partner in innovative digital solutions, helping businesses grow with the latest technology and delivering positive impacts to every client.

content.provide_website: Provide website creation, application development, and other digital solutions tailored to the business needs of our clients.
content.build_strong: Build strong and sustainable partnerships with clients to support their growth and success in the digital world.
content.continuously: Continuously deliver solutions with the latest and most innovative technologies to achieve the best results and enhance efficiency for every client.
content.offer_fast: Offer fast and efficient customer service, ready to assist clients at every stage of project development and management.
content.focus_client: Focus on client satisfaction by delivering accurate solutions, satisfying results, and the best value for their investment.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: BAGIWEBSITE is supported by a team of professionals experienced in digital technology. With expertise in website development, application creation, and digital solutions, we collaborate to create the best results that align with the needs and business objectives of our clients.

quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.content: When we are still given the opportunity to wake up in the morning, it means that God is still giving us the opportunity to do the work that we have to do.

Services.title: SERVICES
Services.content: We offer a variety of website creation and management services designed to meet your needs. All of our services are equipped with the best features, competitive prices, and full support to ensure maximum results.

consultation.title: Free Consultation
consultation.content: Not sure where to start? Our team of experts are ready to help you understand your project needs at no extra cost! Get the best advice before starting your project with us.

features.profile_page: Profile, services, gallery, and contact pages
features.basic_seo: Basic SEO for search engine visibility

features.pages: Homepage, about us, services, blog, and contact pages
features.contact_form: Contact form with Google Maps integration

features.order_tracking: Discount, coupon, and order tracking features

service-4.name: Promotional Landing Page
service-4.discount: 5% for orders of more than 2 landing pages

features.comments_social: Comment system and social media integration

features.custom_design: Custom design and features tailored to requirements

features.server_deploy: Application deployment to servers (AWS, GCP, or local VPS)

features.custom_request: Request or inquire about unavailable services
features.price_estimate: Price estimation based on project complexity
features.tech_suggestion: Technology suggestions suited to your needs

Portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
Portfolio.content_kelas_pintar: Kelas Pintar is a digital learning platform designed to provide an integrated, modern, and effective educational experience for students, teachers, and parents. We develop innovative solutions that include curriculum-based learning materials, interactive exercises, and personalization features that help students achieve the best learning outcomes. In this project, we focus on intuitive interface design, easy navigation, and accessibility across various devices to ensure users from all backgrounds can enjoy an optimal learning experience. With a technology-driven approach based on user needs, the Kelas Pintar project represents a tangible transformation of education in the digital era.
Portfolio.content_pengen_umroh: Pengen Umroh is a digital platform designed to make it easier for prospective pilgrims to plan their Umrah journey. This app provides complete information about Umrah packages, departure schedules, cost details, and customizable additional services to meet user needs. With a user-friendly interface and practical booking features, Pengen Umroh offers a comfortable experience from planning to departure. This project aims to provide ease, transparency, and convenience for pilgrims while supporting a safe and meaningful worship journey.
Portfolio.content_imagine: IMAGINE is an innovative e-commerce platform specifically designed to sell a variety of high-quality footwear collections. This project offers a modern, fast, and convenient online shopping experience while reflecting the brand's stylish and professional identity. IMAGINE's standout features include: Dynamic Catalog: Displaying shoe collections with high-resolution photos, detailed product descriptions, and easy-to-use search filters. Responsive & Mobile-Friendly: A responsive design that ensures the best experience on all devices, whether desktop or mobile. Real-Time Inventory Management: Ensuring stock availability is always up to date. IMAGINE is designed to provide the best online shopping experience, helping customers find shoes that match their style and needs. This project also supports brand expansion into the digital marketplace with modern, reliable technology solutions.
Portfolio.content_idi: IDI Cabang Tangerang is a digital platform designed to support the activities of the Indonesian Medical Association (IDI) Tangerang Branch. This system provides features such as membership management, organizational activity information, administrative data management, and communication services among members. With a modern, user-friendly interface, this platform makes it easier for IDI members to access information such as seminar schedules, training, and medical regulation updates. This project aims to improve operational efficiency, strengthen collaboration among members, and support the professionalism of doctors in the Tangerang region.
Portfolio.content_sehati: Sehati Training Management System is a digital solution designed to simplify training management within an organization. This system includes features such as participant registration, training schedule management, progress tracking, and training evaluation. With an intuitive interface and efficient automation features, the Training Management System helps organizations plan, execute, and monitor training activities comprehensively. This project aims to improve training effectiveness, optimize resource management, and support the continuous skill development of employees.
Portfolio.content_staycation: Staycation Landing Page is designed to provide an attractive and informative visual experience for users looking for the best accommodation solutions. With a modern and responsive design, this landing page features exclusive offers, key features, and customer testimonials in an intuitive layout. Our focus is to create a comfortable user experience with easy navigation, structured information, and stunning visual elements. This project not only enhances brand appeal but also helps improve conversion rates and user trust in the staycation services offered.
Portfolio.content_trustlink: Trustlink Landing Page is designed to strengthen Trustlink's digital presence as a trusted platform for building professional networks. With a clean and professional design, this landing page provides clear information about main services, benefits, and user testimonials. We prioritize the user experience with a responsive layout and intuitive navigation. Engaging visual elements combined with strategically placed call-to-action buttons aim to increase trust and conversions. This project reflects Trustlink's commitment to providing secure and reliable networking solutions for the professional community.
Portfolio.content_battle_tryout: Battle Tryout Kelas Pintar is an innovation in interactive learning designed to increase students' learning enthusiasm through an exciting competitive experience. This feature allows students to take curriculum-based tryouts in a game format, where they can compete in real-time with friends or other students. With an intuitive interface and attractive design, Battle Tryout combines learning and entertainment, creating a fun yet challenging learning environment. This project is designed to improve students' understanding, train critical thinking skills, and motivate them to continue learning in a modern and relevant way.
Portfolio.content_sppbe: SPPBE Dashboard System is designed as a digital solution to help Bulk LPG Filling and Transport Stations (SPPBE) manage their operations more efficiently. This system provides an intuitive dashboard to monitor operational data in real-time, such as LPG distribution, stock management, and activity reporting. With a modern interface and advanced analytics features, the SPPBE Dashboard System facilitates strategic decision-making based on accurate data. This project aims to improve operational efficiency, transparency, and productivity at SPPBE through integrated digital technology.
Portfolio.content_siperpus: SIPERPUS is a modern library information system designed to simplify the management of collection data, members, and book borrowing transactions. This system provides an efficient digital solution for libraries to manage daily operations, whether in educational institutions, offices, or communities. With a user-friendly interface and comprehensive features, SIPERPUS allows: Organized book collection recording. Member management with detailed information and transaction history. Integrated book borrowing and return system with automatic notifications. SIPERPUS is designed with the latest technology to ensure security and scalability, making it reliable for both large and small libraries. This project is a tangible step in supporting literacy and operational efficiency in libraries in the digital era.
Portfolio.content_open_banking: Open Banking App is a digital solution that allows users to easily access, manage, and monitor their finances through one integrated platform. This app is designed to connect various banking and financial services, providing convenience in managing accounts, transferring funds, tracking transactions, and analyzing expenditures. With a modern interface, high-level security features, and robust API integration, Open Banking App offers a seamless and secure user experience. This project aims to promote transparency and efficiency in personal financial management while supporting the adoption of smarter and more connected financial technologies.
Portfolio.content_absensi: Employee Attendance is a digital solution designed to simplify the process of recording and managing employee attendance in companies. This system allows managers and HR to monitor employee attendance in real-time, manage leaves, overtime, and holidays, as well as generate accurate and easily accessible attendance reports. With a user-friendly interface and integrated features, this project provides convenience in managing attendance data without the need for time-consuming manual processes. Employee Attendance helps increase operational efficiency, reduce administrative errors, and support quicker and more accurate decision-making in human resource management.
Portfolio.content_gmp: GMP Coin is a cryptocurrency platform designed to provide secure, transparent, and efficient digital transaction services. This app allows users to easily buy, sell, and store GMP Coin, as well as monitor exchange rates in real-time. GMP Coin also provides a secure digital wallet feature and a two-factor authentication system to protect user transactions. With cutting-edge blockchain technology, this project aims to create a secure and trusted ecosystem in the digital financial world. GMP Coin opens new opportunities for users to engage in the crypto world with fast transactions and low fees while driving the adoption of future financial technologies.
Portfolio.content_cariparkir: CariParkir BOTS is an innovative digital solution designed to help users find and book parking spaces efficiently. With AI-powered chatbot technology, this platform enables users to find nearby parking locations, check space availability, and make reservations in seconds. The main focus of this project is to create a fast and intuitive user experience through a friendly interface and advanced automation features. CariParkir BOTS helps reduce the stress of finding parking spaces while increasing user efficiency and comfort in busy urban areas.
Portfolio.content_sport_massage: Sport Massage is an app designed to help users find the best sports massage services according to their needs. This app provides complete information about various types of sports massages, their benefits, and the locations of nearby service providers. In addition, users can easily and quickly book services through an intuitive platform. With a responsive design and advanced search features, Sport Massage provides a comfortable and efficient user experience. This project aims to support the recovery and fitness of athletes and active individuals, offering convenience in finding and enjoying quality sports massage services.
Portfolio.content_asy_syifa: Pesantren Asy-Syfa’ Landing Page is designed to introduce and promote the pesantren to prospective students and parents in an engaging and informative way. This page displays important information such as the pesantren's history, vision and mission, available facilities, and educational programs offered. With a clean and responsive design, this landing page is designed to provide a comfortable user experience and easy accessibility on various devices. This project aims to strengthen Pesantren Asy-Syfa’s presence in the digital world, providing clear information and attracting prospective students to join the pesantren.
